description.zh-CN: 交互式地圖位置選擇器組件，允許用戶通過地圖交互、搜索功能和地址輸入選擇地理坐標。具有位置預覽、縮放功能和與地理編碼服務的集成。
description.en-US: An interactive map-based location picker component that allows users to select geographical coordinates through map interaction, search functionality, and address input. Features location preview, zooming capabilities, and integration with geocoding services.

description.zh-CN: 默认样式風格的地图选择器實現
description.en-US: Interactive map picker with drag-to-pan, location search, zoom controls, and real-time coordinate display. Features red marker pin, grid background, park and water layers for a complete location selection experience.
